ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup ketchup (such as HeinzÂ®), or to taste
des: "This is my husband's favorite salad dressing. BaBas has been making this for him since he was 10 years old. Use this on salads, as a veggie dip, or great for Reuben sandwiches. Will keep in fridge for 2 weeks."
ins: Whisk mayonnaise, eggs, Worcestershire sauce, relish, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until smooth. Whisk in ketchup until desired color and consistency is reached.
